title: Horror Tense - Fearful Ambience Pack
description: 12 dark soundscapes and tension-building horror atmospheres
longDescription:
120 min of Fearful Horror Atmosphere


Soundcloud Demo

Preview on YouTube


With “Horror Tense” sound library Polysonic Audio brings you a versatile, high quality, dark cinematic ambient sound arsenal ranging from massive, bassy, sub, noise-like drones sound effects, creepy, otherworldly, organic, thriller-like soundscapes and tension-building atmospheres, to the eerie, resonating, hair-raising, horror ambience sounds that will easily find a way into your next movie, game, trailer, video, music track, and more! 


Including:

  • 12 perfectly looping tracks - short versions of original tracks, 1 - 2 minutes long
  • 12 original full length tracks - 10 min. each


Perfect for any production involving fearful and scary scenes of destroyed zombie cities, horror quests, haunting, eerie hospitals and landscapes, huge, abandoned deep cave, creepy halls, corridors, tunnels, and devastated, gloomy, dark areas. This professionally designed sound library will provide you with a vast variety of drones, soundscapes, atmospheres, textures, and horror ambience sounds that will bring sonic perspective to scenes and images of a fearful atmosphere full of loneliness, anxiety and tension


For support and other questions, please send an email to: polysonicaudio@gmail.com


Tags

 #Atmosphere #Ambient #Drone #Scary #Dark #Noise #Ambience #Eerie #Creepy #Horror #Dark #Thriller #Soundscape
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • High quality audio
  • Ready-to-use sounds
  • Absolutely original content
  • All tracks are generated in 3 stages of processing and manipulation with the most modern granular synthesizers and randomization plugins. All this gave a unique and inimitable result, which you are unlikely to find anywhere else


Number of Audio Waves: 24

Number of Audio Cues: 24

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 120

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
